caption: Relating to applying an active efforts standard for the removal of certain children in the managing conservatorship of the Department of Family and Protective Services.
last_action: 02/03/2025 S Referred to Health & Human Services
summary: This bill modifies the Family Code by replacing "reasonable efforts" with "active efforts" in child welfare cases. While not specifically targeting Chinese immigrants, it affects all families involved with Child Protective Services by requiring more proactive and thorough efforts from the Department of Family and Protective Services to maintain or reunite families before terminating parental rights.
translation: 该法案通过将儿童福利案件中的"合理努力"改为"积极努力"来修改《家庭法》。虽然没有特别针对中国移民，但它通过要求家庭和保护服务部在终止父母权利之前做出更积极和全面的努力来维持或重聚家庭，从而影响到所有涉及儿童保护服务的家庭。
committees:
1. Committee on Family Services
2. Committee on Human Services
3. Committee on Juvenile Justice Family Issues
